title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. III, subch. C, art. 1 - Highway Use and Fuel Use Permits
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. III, subch. C, art. 1 - Highway Use and Fuel Use Permits

State Regulations

Part 470 - Vehicles Required To Have Permits (§ 470.1 to 470.4)

Part 471 - Exemptions And Exclusions (§ 471.1 to 471.8)

Part 472 - Maximum Gross Weight And Unloaded Weight (§ 472.1 to 472.7)

Part 473 - Applications For Permits (§ 473.1 to 473.9)

Part 474 - Permits, Plates And Stickers (§ 474.1 to 474.13)

Part 475 - Denial, Suspension Or Revocation Of Permits (§ 475.1 to 475.5)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. III, subch. C, art. 1

The provisions of this Article are not applicable to the

Fuel Use Tax imposed under article 21-A of the Tax Law, effective January 1, 1996. This Article does not reflect certain amendments made to article 21 of
such law. State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
